column2: Table 4. Niclosamide analogs attenuate hepatic steatosis in high fat diet fed mice. 20-week old HFD-fed mice were delivered vehicle or compound daily at 10mg/kg by

column1: I.P for 12 days. Body weight measurements and scoring of greasy coat phenotype were performed prior to and following treatment. Histological analysis of H&E stained
liver sections were analyzed and the % of steatosis and steatosis score are reported.
